mapper.select: select t.*,b.name as bname,u.name as uname from t_book_collect t,t_books b,t_user u where t.id = #{id} and t.books_id=b.id and t.user_id=u.id
select t.*,b.name as bname,u.name as uname from t_book_collect t,t_books b,t_user u where t.books_id=b.id and t.user_id=u.id order by t.create_time desc limit #{pageNo},#{pageSize}
select count(t.id) from t_book_collect t,t_books b,t_user u where t.books_id=b.id and t.user_id=u.id
mapper.insert: insert into t_book_collect (user_id, books_id, create_time) values (#{userId}, #{booksId},#{createTime})
mapper.update: update t_book_collect set status=#{status} where id=#{id}
